bibl.title: Architectural Styles of Ancient Alexandria. Elements of Architectural Decoration from Polish Excavations at Kom el-Dikka (1960-1993).

series.title: Centre d'Archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie polonaise des Sciences et Centre Kazimierz Michalowski d'Archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Université de Varsovie. Alexandrie.

bibl.publisher: Académie polonaise des Sciences. Centre d'Archéologie méditerranéenne
bibl.note: Introduction. - Part I: 1. Ancient Alexandria and its buildings - historical outline; - 2. Review of architectural styles used in Alexandria from the 3rd century B.C.; - 3. Buildings of ancient Alexandria. - Part II: 1. Architectural complexes discovered on Kom el-Dikka; - 2. Elements of architectural decoration found on Kom el-Dikka (1960-1993); - 3. The Kom el-Dikka assemblage in the Alexandrian context. - Part III. Catalogue [1-1254]. - Appendix.
bibl.seg: TKACZOW Barbara, Architectural Styles of Ancient Alexandria. Elements of Architectural Decoration from Polish Excavations at Kom el-Dikka (1960-1993). (Centre d'Archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie polonaise des Sciences et Centre Kazimierz Michalowski d'Archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Université de Varsovie. Alexandrie. VIII.)
Varsovie, Académie polonaise des Sciences. Centre d'Archéologie méditerranéenne, 2008, 4°, 369 pp. et 154 pll. + pll. A-D coul. ISBN 83-922-3195-3.

Introduction. - Part I: 1. Ancient Alexandria and its buildings - historical outline; - 2. Review of architectural styles used in Alexandria from the 3rd century B.C.; - 3. Buildings of ancient Alexandria. - Part II: 1. Architectural complexes discovered on Kom el-Dikka; - 2. Elements of architectural decoration found on Kom el-Dikka (1960-1993); - 3. The Kom el-Dikka assemblage in the Alexandrian context. - Part III. Catalogue [1-1254]. - Appendix.
